name: Ultrasignup
0:
”Alexa, ask ultra signup”
”Alexa, launch ultra signup”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: ultra signup
des: This skill looks up the address your Amazon device and then uses that to find ultra marathon races near your location in the next 12 months. You can ask for a specific ultramarathon distance by providing a distance code such as 7 for a 100 mile run or 6 for a 100K run.
